name: Viveka Backend - Development
description:
Development environment for Viveka Backend API testing

IMPORTANT NOTES:

1. Update 'phoneNumber' and 'otp' before testing
   - Run 'Send OTP' request to get the actual OTP from server logs
   - Replace the 'otp' value with the one printed in console

2. IDs are auto-populated:
   - clientId, token, deviceSessionId (from Login)
   - itemGroupId (from Create Item Group)
   - itemId (from Create Item)
   - customerId (from Get/Create Customer)
   - cartId (from Create Cart)
   - cartItemId (from Add Item to Cart)
   - invoiceId (from Generate Invoice)

3. Testing sequence:
   1. Send OTP â†’ Get OTP from logs
   2. Verify OTP
   3. Register Client
   4. Login Client (auto-saves token & IDs)
   5. Create Item Group
   6. Create Items
   7. Get/Create Customer
   8. Create Cart
   9. Add Items to Cart
   10. Generate Invoice OR Create Incomplete Sale
   11. Record Payment (if using incomplete sale)
   12. Get Payment History
   13. View Purchase History

4. Server must be running:
   npm install (to install dependencies)
   npm start (to start server on port 5000)
   MongoDB must be running on localhost:27017
